授業目的: The purpose of this course is to enable students to read and discuss authentic literary texts in English. Currently many young people enjoy English literature as a form of visual contents, such as movies and videos, and only few people read the written originals. This course will provide you with opportunities to read a fantasy series created by Ursula K. Le Guin. You will also interpret the stories with connecting to their own lives.
到達目標:
1. You will be able to read the entire fantasy story written in authentic English by Ursula K. Le Guin.
2. You will be able to interpret the key ideas that constitute the story and exchange them with others.
3. You will be able to express their thoughts in form of presentations and essays.
授業方法:
- When possible, it might be switched to in-person class later in the semester.
- In-class zoom will be available for those who're officially permitted to keep participating online throughout the semester.
- The course materials will be provided as PDFs. You need a computer/tablet (not a smartphone) to participate in in-person class.
